subject: Career
title: Benefits Most People Overlook
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Benefits Most People Overlook.

hook.text: Health insurance, 401(k) match, and PTO get attention. But there are hidden benefits worth thousands.

buildup.text: Education stipends, wellness budgets, transit passes, and professional development funds add up fast.

discovery.text: A $5,000 learning budget or a $200/month wellness stipend is real money most don't negotiate.

twist.text: These items often have separate budgets and are easier to approve than salary increases.

climax.text: Ask: 'What's the full benefits package?' Then negotiate the pieces that matter most to you.

punchline.text: The offer letter is the headline. Benefits are the fine print that pays.

quiz.question: Why are non-salary benefits easier to negotiate?
options: They often come from separate budgets
